price: Iyi (Qur’an) ni urwibutso. Kandi mu by’ukuri abagandukira (Allah) bazagira igarukiro ryiza;
arabic: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: hādhā dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqīna laḥus'na maābin
